channel.title: Need help with hail
channel.description: Hey guys i was trying to add ::hail to my source which is drag-pkz (ive changed basically everything) i dont really know what to do. dont call me a noob lol, im just learning how to do most of this stuff, but major help please. Also let me know if its in the right place, i really didnt know where to put it. SOME ONE FREAKING HELP ME LOL :) I managed to get it so I and the other players bow down but i cant get them to say all hail so and so, only i say it. [img]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/9250/omgerrorhp1.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need help with hail
item.dc:creator: @icepkers icepkers
item.description:
@icepkers wrote:

public void hail()
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
castOn.plrText = “hail text”;
castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY);
castOn.setAnimation(1651);
castOn.updateRequired = true;
castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}

if(command.startsWith(“hail”) && playerRights > 2){
hail();
}

Read full topic
